step_data.thought: I'm now on the 'Pending Reviews' page which is exactly where I need to be to review pending product reviews from customers. Looking at the table in the main content area, I can see the column headers for the review data including ID, Created, Title, Nickname, Review, Visibility, Type, Product, SKU, and Action. However, I notice at the bottom of the table it says 'We couldn't find any records.' This indicates that there are currently no pending reviews in the system that need to be reviewed. The page shows '0 records found' in the records counter. Since there are no pending reviews to review at this time, I should inform the user of this finding.
step_data.action: stop('There are currently no pending product reviews from customers that need to be reviewed. The system shows 0 records in the Pending Reviews section.')
